search_results.snippet:
The Simple Solution to Rubik's Cube by James G. Nourse is a book that was 
published in 1981. The book explains how to solve the Rubik's Cube. Nourse 
wrote the book while on the staff of the Chemistry Department at Stanford 
University. The book became the best-selling book of 1981, selling 6,680,000 
copies...
